医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
深部脑刺激可改善帕金森病患者的生活质量研究人员比较了单独药物治疗或丘脑底核深部脑刺激对帕金森病患者生活质量的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Deep-brain-stimulation-may-improve-quality-of-life-in-Parkinson-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Deep-brain-stimulation-may-improve-quality-of-life-in-Parkinson-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd4041b-8f0a-4d1f-a581-ddddc003ac63 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:50:00 -0500 Deep brain stimulation may improve quality of life in Parkinsons disease
研究表明减肥和缓解糖尿病对心脏和肾脏有持久的好处RCSI 医学与健康科学大学人口健康学院的研究人员提供了新的证据，证明减肥努力对健康有益，可以缓解 2 型糖尿病患者的糖尿病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows- permanent-benefits-of-weight-loss-and-diabetes-remission-for-the-heart-and-kidneys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows- permanent-benefits-of-weight-loss-and-diabetes-remission-for-the-heart-and-kidneys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02b1146b-3de3-45fa-a439-484adfb73b7d Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:08:00 -0500 Study shows lasting benefits of weight loss and diabetes remission for the heart and kidneys
空气污染对心脏的影响程度低得惊人，但饮食可能提供保护芬兰最近的一项研究表明，接触空气污染物，即使浓度非常低，也与心脏代谢危险因素的不利变化有关https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Air-pollution-affects-the-heart-at-surprisingly-low-levels-but-diet-may-offer-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Air-pollution-affects-the-heart-at-surprisingly-low-levels-but-diet-may-offer-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af4ad473-91a0-481e-b715-8a9e595df3fe Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:06:00 -0500 Air pollution affects the heart at surprisingly low levels, but diet may offer protection
医疗保健公司利用人工智能应对供应链挑战《Economist Impact》由 DP World 支持的新研究显示，46% 的医疗保健行业公司正在使用人工智能 (AI) 来识别和解决其供应链中的潜在中断，这突显了该行业对适应性和弹性的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Healthcare-companies-harness-AI-to-navigate-supply-chain-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Healthcare-companies-harness-AI-to-navigate-supply-chain-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=328f63c8-c2c2-47ef-8418-5d0f6ef77ef8 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:04:00 -0500 Healthcare companies harness AI to navigate supply chain challenges
科学家发现受 COVID-19 影响的关键脑细胞最近的一项细胞干细胞研究调查了 SARS-CoV-2 感染是否会导致多巴胺能神经元衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-key-brain-cells-affected-by-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-key-brain-cells-affected-by-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=898c3d95-d4b7-494a-8f57-ffda6f69f13c Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:03:00 -0500 Scientists discover key brain cells affected by COVID-19
研究揭示 CD4+ T 细胞对抗黑色素瘤的惊人功效在彼得·多尔蒂感染与免疫研究所（Doherty Institute）领导并发表在《科学免疫学》上的研究中，研究人员发现 CD4+ T 细胞传统上被称为“辅助性 T 细胞”，因为它们在帮助激活其他免疫细胞方面发挥着作用，对控制黑色素瘤非常有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-reveals-surprising-power-of-CD42b-T-cells-against-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-reveals-surprising-power-of-CD42b-T-cells-against-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01a5618a-d572-4e7e-a16d-a8413f2cb2c2 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:01:00 -0500 Study reveals surprising power of CD4+ T cells against melanoma
虚拟现实可以分散人们对慢性疼痛的注意力，同时促进锻炼加强锻炼通常会被提上新年的议程，但如果您正在努力坚持新的健身方式，南澳大利亚大学的研究表明，虚拟现实 (VR) 不仅能让锻炼感觉更轻松，还能缓解慢性疼痛https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Virtual-reality-distracts-from-chronic-pain-while-boosting-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Virtual-reality-distracts-from-chronic-pain-while-boosting-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=253c9188-7e39-4453-bc40-48236d158191 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 03:59:00 -0500 Virtual reality distracts from chronic pain while boosting exercise
HoloCare 在英国和欧洲推出 3D 手术全息图挪威医疗科技初创公司 HoloCare 在获得 UKCA 和 CE 认证后，扩大其在英国和欧洲的商业足迹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/HoloCare-launches-3D-surgical-holograms-across-the-UK-and-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/HoloCare-launches-3D-surgical-holograms-across-the-UK-and-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bb99e54-dece-4883-ac99-a1f1193a23f3 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 03:54:00 -0500 HoloCare launches 3D surgical holograms across the UK and Europe
社会逆境如何影响儿童压力和炎症的生物标志物？最近的一项研究评估了社会逆境是否影响儿童炎症和压力的生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/How-does-social-adversity-influence-biomarkers-of-stress-and-inflammation-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/How-does-social-adversity-influence-biomarkers-of-stress-and-inflammation-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea58a8f9-2856-4a34-9f4b-3879e3c4bbb1 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 03:52:00 -0500 How does social adversity influence biomarkers of stress and inflammation in children?
ATSE欢迎人工智能监管取得进展，敦促迅速采取行动和采取强有力的措施澳大利亚技术科学与工程学院 (ATSE) 对今天发布的澳大利亚政府关于安全和负责任的人工智能 (AI) 的中期报告表示欢迎，其中包括 ATSE 提出的许多问题和建议，并敦促在关键领域迅速采取行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/ATSE-welcomes-progress-on-AI-regulations-urges-swift-action-and-robust-measures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/ATSE-welcomes-progress-on-AI-regulations-urges-swift-action-and-robust-measures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f235a32e-a153-4536-b168-6058cc8d5233 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 03:51:00 -0500 ATSE welcomes progress on AI regulations, urges swift action and robust measures
